src: ”Vi har nu 4 månader gamla möss som har blivit kvitt sin diabetes”, tillade han.
mt: “We now have 4-month-old mice that have gotten rid of their diabetes,” he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor i medicin vid Dalhousie University i Halifax, Nova Scotia och ordförande för den kliniska och vetenskapliga avdelningen av  den Kanadensiska diabetesföreningen, varnade för att forskningen fortfarande befinner sig i ett tidigt stadium.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chairman of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, warned that the research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Som vissa andra experter är han skeptisk till om diabetes kan botas och påpekar att dessa resultat inte är relevanta för personer som redan har typ 1-diabetes.
mt: As some other experts are, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured and notes that these results are not relevant to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: På måndagen tillkännagav Svenska Akademiens ständiga sekreterare Sara Danius offentligt under ett radioprogram på Sveriges Radio att utskottet inte kunde nå Bob Dylan direkt angående mottagandet av Nobelpriset i litteratur 2016, och att det därför hade gett upp sina försök att nå honom.
mt: On Monday, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, Sara Danius, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio that the committee had been unable to reach Bob Dylan directly regarding the awarding of the Nobel Prize in Literature 2016, and that it had therefore given up its attempts to reach him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: "Danius sa, ""Just nu gör vi ingenting. Jag har ringt och skickat mejl till hans närmsta medarbetare och har fått väldigt vänliga svar. Det får sannerligen räcka för tillfället."""
mt: "Danius said, ""Right now we're doing nothing. I've called and emailed his closest colleagues and have gotten very friendly responses. That will have to do for now."""
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Rings VD, Jamie Smirnoff, påpekade tidigare att företaget startade när hans dörrklocka inte gick att höra från hans verkstad i garaget.
mt: Rings CEO, Jamie Smirnoff, previously noted that the company started when his doorbell didn't work from his workshop in the garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Han berättade att han hade byggt en wifi-dörrklocka.
mt: He told me that he had built a wifi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Smirnoff sa att försäljningen ökade efter hans medverkan i ett avsnitt av Shark Tank 2013, där panelen sa nej till att finansiera startupen.
mt: Smirnoff said sales increased after his appearance on a 2013 episode of Shark Tank, where the panel said no to funding the startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: I slutet av 2017 dök Siminoff upp på shopping-tv-kanalen QVC.
mt: 2017 saw Siminoff appear on shopping TV channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring vann också en rättsprocess mot ett konkurrerande säkerhetsföretag, ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring also won a lawsuit against a competing security company, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Medan ett experimentellt vaccin verkar kunna minska eboladödligheten, har hittils inga läkemedel tydligt visat sig lämpliga för behandling av befintlig infektion.
mt: While an experimental vaccine appears to reduce Ebola mortality, no drugs have yet been shown to be effective for treating existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: En cocktail med antikroppar, ZMapp, såg till en början lovande ut inom fältet, men formella studier indikerade att den hade färre fördelar än förväntat för att förhindra dödsfall.
mt: A cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, initially looked promising in the field, but formal studies indicated it had fewer benefits than expected to prevent deaths.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: I PALM-studien fungerade ZMapp som en kontroll, vilket innebar att forskare använde det som referens och jämförde de tre andra behandlingarna med den.
mt: In the PALM study, ZMapp was a control, meaning researchers used it as a reference and compared the three other treatments to it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA:s gymnastikförbund stödjer USA:s olympiska kommittés brev och håller med om att det är absolut nödvändigt att den olympiska familjen främjar en säker miljö för alla våra atleter.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and agrees that it is absolutely necessary that the Olympic family promotes a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Vi är eniga med USOC:s uttalande om att våra idrottares och klubbars intressen kan tjänas bättre om vi går vidare med en meningsfull förändring av vår organisation, än om certifieringen tas bort.
mt: We agree with USOC's statement that our athletes' and clubs' interests can be better served by moving forward with a meaningful change in our organization, than by having the certification revoked.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA:s gymnastikförbund stöder en oberoende utredning som kan kasta ljus över hur ett missbruk av sådana proportioner som det som så modigt beskrivits av överlevaren Larry Nassar kan ha pågått oupptäckt så länge, och man välkomnar nödvändiga och ändamålsenliga förändringar.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association supports an independent investigation that can shed light on how a misuse of such proportions as that described so bravely by survivor Larry Nassar could have gone on so long undetected, and welcomes necessary and effective changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics och USOC har samma mål - att göra gymnastiken och andra sporter så säkra som möjligt, så att idrottare ska kunna följa sina drömmar i en trygg, positiv och stärkande miljö.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC have the same goal - to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible, so that athletes can follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowering environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Under hela 1960-talet, arbetade Brzezinski som rådgivare åt John F. Kennedy och därefter för Lyndon B. Johnsons administration.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and then for Lyndon B. Johnson's administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Under valen 1976 var han utrikespolitisk rådgivare för Carter, och tjänade senare som nationell säkerhetsrådgivare (NSA) från 1977 till 1981, efter Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, he was foreign policy adviser to Carter, and later served as National Security Adviser (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, after Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Liksom NSA hjälpte han Carter i diplomatisk hantering av världsfrågor, t.ex. Camp David-överenskommelserna 1978; normalisering av förbindelserna mellan USA och Kina i slutet av 1970-talet; den iranska revolutionen, som ledde till gisslankrisen i Iran 1979; och den sovjetiska invasionen i Afghanistan 1979.
mt: Like NSA, he helped Carter in diplomatic handling of world affairs, e.g. the Camp David Accords 1978; normalization of relations between the United States and China in the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Filmen, med Ryan Gosling och Emma Stone, fick nomineringar i alla stora kategorier.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling och Stone nominerades till bästa manliga skådespelare respektive bästa kvinnliga skådespelare.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for best actor and best actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: De andra nomineringarna inkluderar bästa film, regissör, filmkonst, kostymdesign, filmredigering, originalmusik, produktionsdesign, ljudredigering, ljudmixning och originalmanus.
mt: Other nominations include best picture, director, cinematography, costume design, film editing, original score, production design, sound editing, sound mixing and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Två låtar från filmen, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) och City of Stars, nominerades för bästa originallåt. Lionsgate-studion fick 26 nomineringar – fler än någon annan studio.
mt: 2 songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations – more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Sent på söndagen meddelade USA:s president Donald Trump via sin pressekreterare att amerikansk trupp ska lämna Syrien.
mt: On Sunday evening, U.S. President Donald Trump announced via his press secretary that American troops will leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Tillkännagivandet gjordes efter att Trump haft ett telefonsamtal med den turkiske presidenten Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
mt: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turkiet skulle också ta över bevakningen av tillfångatagna ISIS-soldater som, enligt uttalandet, europeiska länder hade vägrat att skicka hem.
mt: Turkey would also take over the monitoring of captured ISIS soldiers, according to the statement, who European countries had refused to send home.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Det bekräftar inte bara att åtminstone vissa dinosaurier hade fjädrar, en teori som redan är utbredd, utan ger också detaljer som fossiler ofta inte kan ge, såsom färg och tredimensionellt arrangemang.
mt: It not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that is already widespread, but also provides details such as color and three-dimensional arrangement that fossils often cannot.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Forskarna säger att det här djurets fjäderdräkt var kastanjebrun på ovansidan, med en blek eller karotenoid-färgad undersida.
mt: The researchers say this animal's feathered coat was chestnut brown on top, with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Fyndet ger också inblick i utvecklingen av fjädrar hos fåglar.
mt: The find also gives insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: I och med att dinosauriefjädrarna inte har ett välutvecklat skaft, så kallad spole, men däremot har andra kännetecken på fjädrar – strålar och bistrålar – drog forskarna slutsatsen att spolen sannolikt var en senare evolutionär utveckling än de här andra kännetecken.
mt: Because the dinosaur feathers did not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but instead had other characteristics of feathers – barbs and barbules – the researchers concluded that the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development than these other characteristics.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Fjädrarnas struktur indikerar att de inte användes för att flyga utan istället för temperaturreglering eller för uppvisning. Forskarna föreslog att exemplaret visar en vuxen fjäderdräkt och inte kycklingdun, även om svansen kommer från en ung dinosaurie.
mt: The structure of the feathers indicates they were not used for flight but instead for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested the specimen shows an adult feathered coat and not juvenile down, even though the tail comes from a young dinosaur.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Forskarna menade att även om detta är svansen från en ung dinosaurie, visar provet på vuxen fjäderdräkt och inte ungt dun.
mt: The researchers said that even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the evidence shows adult feathering and not juvenile down.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: En bilbomb som detonerade vid polishögkvarteret i Gaziantep i Turkiet igår morse dödade två poliser och skadade fler än tjugo andra personer.
mt: A car bomb that exploded outside the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Enligt guvernörsstaben var nitton av de skadade poliser.
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers, according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Polisen säger att en misstänkt IS-medlem tros vara ansvarig för attacken.
mt: Police say a suspected IS member is believed to be responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: De fann att solen fungerade enligt samma grundläggande principer som andra stjärnor: Aktiviteten hos alla stjärnor i systemet befanns drivas av deras ljusstyrka, deras rotation, och ingenting annat.
mt: They found that the sun worked according to the same basic principles as other stars: the activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Med hjälp av ljusstyrka och rotation bestäms stjärnans rossbytal, vilket har att göra med plasmaflöden.
mt: Using brightness and rotation, the Rossby number of the star is determined, which has to do with plasma flows.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Ju lägre rossbynummer, desto mindre aktiv är stjärnan i fråga om magnetiska omkastningar.
mt: The lower the Rossby number, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Iwasaki stötte på problem vid många tillfällen under sin resa.
mt: Iwasaki encountered problems at many times during his journey.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Han blev rånad av pirater, attackerad i Tibet av en rabiat hund, undflydde ett äktenskap i Nepal och blev arresterad i Indien.
mt: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped a marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Standarden 802.11n fungerar på både frekvensen 2,4 GHz och 5,0 GHz.
mt: 802.11n standard works on both frequencies 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Detta gör att den är bakåtkompatibel med 802.11a, 802.11b och 802.11g, förutsatt att basstationen har två radioapparater.
mt: 802.11n is backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has two radio devices.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Hastigheterna på 802.11n är betydligt snabbare än sina föregångares med en maximal teoretisk genomströmning på 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are significantly faster than its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Miller, som historien berättades för, fick inget större intryck av Duvall, som är gift och har två barn.
mt: Miller, who the story was told to, was not impressed by Duvall, who is married and has two children.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: "På frågan om en kommentar sa Miller: ""Mike talar mycket under utfrågningen...Jag höll på att förbereda mig så jag hörde inte riktigt vad han sa."""
mt: "On the question of a comment Miller said: ""Mike talks a lot during the interrogation...I was preparing myself so I didn't really hear what he said."""
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: """Vi strävar efter att minska koldioxidutsläppen i förhållande till BNP väsentligt år 2020 från nivån 2005"", sade Hu."
mt: """We are striving to reduce carbon dioxide emissions in relation to GDP significantly in 2020 from the level of 2005"", Hu said."
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Han sa att nedskärningarna skulle baseras på Kinas ekonomiska styrka, och gav inte några siffror för dem.
mt: He said the cuts would be based on China's economic strength, and gave no figures for them.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: "Hu uppmuntrade utvecklingsländer ""att undvika det gamla sättet med att förorena först och städa upp senare."".                    "
mt: ""Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old way of polluting first and cleaning up later.""".                    "
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: "Han tillade att ""de dock inte borde förväntas att ta på sig skyldigheter som går bortom deras utvecklingsnivå, ansvar och förmågor."""
mt: "He added that ""they should not be expected to take on responsibilities that go beyond their level of development, accountability and capabilities."""
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Studiegruppen för Irak lade fram sin rapport kl.12.00 i dag.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at noon today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Det varnar Ingen kan garantera att någon åtgärd i Irak vid denna tidpunkt kommer att stoppa sekteristisk krigföring, växande våld eller en glidning mot kaos.
mt: No one can guarantee that any action in Iraq at this time will stop sectarian violence, growing violence or a slide toward chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Rapporten inleds med en vädjan om en öppen diskussion och ett samförstånd i USA om Mellanösternpolitiken.
mt: The report begins with a plea for an open discussion and a consensus in the United States on Middle East policy.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Rapporten är mycket kritisk till nästan varje aspekt av den verkställande maktens nuvarande policy mot Irak och anmodar en omedelbar ändring av dess riktning.
mt: The report is highly critical of nearly every aspect of the executive power's current policy towards Iraq and urges an immediate change of its direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Den första av dess 78 rekommendationer är att ett nytt diplomatiskt initiativ bör tas innan slutet av det här året, för att säkra Iraks gränser mot fientliga interventioner, och att återetablera diplomatiska relationer med dess grannar.
mt: The first of its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year, to secure Iraq's borders against hostile interventions, and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Nuvarande senator och Argentinas första dam Cristina Fernández de Kirchner tillkännagav sin presidentkandidatur igår kväll i La Plata, en stad 50 kilometer (31 miles) från Buenos Aires.
mt: Current senator and Argentina's first lady Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Fru Kirchner tillkännagav sin intention att kandidera till president på den argentinska teatern, samma plats där hon startade sin kampanj till senaten år 2005 som medlem i provinsdelegationen från Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president on the Argentine stage, the same place where she started her campaign for the Senate in 2005 as a member of the Buenos Aires provincial delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: "Debatten väcktes på grund av kontroversen kring kostnader för undsättning och återuppbyggnad efter orkanen Katrina; vilka av vissa finans-konservativa humoristiskt har kallats ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."""
mt: "The debate was sparked by controversy over costs for relief and rebuilding after Hurricane Katrina; which some financial conservatives have humorously called "Bush's New Orleans Deal.""
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Liberal kritik av återuppbyggnadsarbetet har fokuserat på tilldelningen av återuppbyggnadskontrakt till förmodade Washington-insiderpersoner.
mt: Liberal criticism of the rebuilding work has focused on the awarding of rebuilding contracts to alleged Washington insiders.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Över fyra miljoner människor reste till Rom för att närvara vid begravningen.
mt: 4.5 million people traveled to Rome to attend the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Antalet sörjande var så stort att det inte var möjligt för alla att komma in och närvara vid begravningen på Petersplatsen.
mt: The number of mourners was so great that it was not possible for all to enter and attend the funeral at Peters Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Flera stora tv-skärmar installerades på olika platser i Rom för att folket skulle kunna se ceremonin.
mt: Several large TV screens were installed in various places in Rome for the people to be able to see the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: I många italienska städer och i resten av världen, särskilt i Polen, gjordes liknande installationer som sågs av ett stort antal människor.
mt: In many Italian cities and in the rest of the world, especially in Poland, similar installations were seen by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Historiker har kritiserat tidigare FBI-policys för att fokusera resurser på fall som är enkla att lösa, i synnerhet fall med stulna bilar, med avsikten att förbättra byråns framgångsstatistik.
mt: Historians have criticized previous FBI policies for focusing resources on cases that are easy to solve, especially cases involving stolen cars, with the intention of improving the agency's success statistics.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongressen anslog medel för att bekämpa obscenitet räkenskapsåret 2005, och klargjorde att FBI måste ha 10 agenter som arbetar med pornografi.
mt: 2005 Congress allocated funds to combat obscenity, and clarified that the FBI must have 10 agents working on pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa gjorde innings högsta poäng, 70 runs på bara 41 bollar genom att slå 11 fyror och 2 sexor.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest innings, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Slagmännen, Sachin Tendulkar och Rahul Dravid, presterade bra och gjorde hundra runs.
mt: The batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred runs.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Men efter att ha förlorat kaptenens grind tog Indien bara 36 poäng och förlorade 7 grindar för att avsluta spelomgångarna.
mt: But after losing the captain's gate, India only scored 36 points and lost 7 gates to end the round robin.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: USA:s president George W. Bush anlände i Singapore på morgonen den 16 november, vilket inledde en veckolång turné i Asien.
mt: 16 November 2005: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Han mottogs av Singapores vice premiärminister Wong Kan Seng och diskuterade handels- och terrorismfrågor med Singapores premiärminister Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Efter en vecka av förluster i mellanårsvalet berättade Bush för en publik om ökad handel i Asien.
mt: After a week of losses in the midterm elections, Bush told an audience of increased trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: "Premiärminister Stephen Harper har gått med på att skicka regeringens ""Clean Air Act"" till en parlamentarisk kommitté för granskning före den andra behandlingen, efter tisdagens 25-minutersmöte med NDP-ledaren Jack Layton på PMO."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's "Clean Air Act" to a parliamentary committee for review before the second reading, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at PMO."
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: "Layton har under mötet med premiärministern bett om förändringar i de konservativas miljöprogram, och efterfrågat en ""grundlig och fullständig omskrivning"" av det Konservativa partiets miljöprogram. "
mt: "Layton has asked for changes to the Conservatives' environmental program during the meeting with the prime minister, and has requested a ""thorough and complete rewrite"" of the Conservative Party's environmental program."
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Ända sedan den federala regeringen gick in för att ta över finansieringen av Mersey-sjukhuset i Devonport, Tasmanien, har delstatsregeringen och några federala parlamentsledamöter kritiserat denna handling som ett jippo i förspelet till det federala valet som kommer att äga rum i november.
mt: Since the federal government took over funding for the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal parliamentarians have criticised this as a stunt ahead of the federal election due in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Men premiärminister John Howard har sagt att åtgärden vidtogs endast för att garantera att sjukhusinrättningarna inte skulle nedgraderas av den tasmanska regeringen, genom att skänka ytterligare 45 miljoner australiska dollar.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the action was taken only to ensure that hospital facilities would not be downgraded by the Tasmanian government, by giving an additional 45 million Australian dollars.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Enligt den senaste bulletinen indikerade mätningar av havsnivån att en tsunami genererats. Det fanns klara tsunami-aktiviteter registrerade nära Pago Pago och Niue.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level measurements indicated a tsunami had been generated. There were clear tsunami activities recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Inga större skador har rapporterats i Tonga, men strömmen försvann tillfälligt, vilket enligt rapport hindrade myndigheterna i Tonga att ta emot tsunamivarningen som utfärdats av PTWC.
mt: No major damage has been reported in Tonga, but the power went out briefly, which according to reports prevented the authorities in Tonga from receiving the tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Fjorton skolor nära kusten på Hawaii var stängda under hela onsdagen trots att varningarna lyfts.
mt: 14 schools near the coast of Hawaii were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: USA:s president George W. Bush välkomnade beskedet.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the news.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: "Bushs talesman Gordon Johndroe kallade Nordkoreas löfte ""ett stort steg mot målet att uppnå en bekräftad nedrustning på den koreanska halvön."""
mt: "Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a big step toward the goal of verified denuclearization of the Korean peninsula.""
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Den tionde namngivna stormen i den atlantiska orkansäsongen, den subtropiska stormen Jerry, bildades i Atlanten idag.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, subtropical storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) meddelar att Jerry inte utgör något hot mot land vid denna tidpunkt.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) reports that Jerry does not pose a threat to land at this time.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Den amerikanska ingenjörskåren bedömde att 6 tums regn skulle kunna få de tidigare skadade fördämningarna att brista.
mt: 6 inches of rain could cause the previously damaged levees to break, according to the American engineering corps.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Det nionde kvarteret, som var så mycket som 20 fot under översvämningar under orkanen Katrina, är för närvarande dränkt i midjehögt vatten efter att den närliggande skyddsvallen blev översköljd.
mt: 9th Ward, which was as much as 20 feet underwater during Hurricane Katrina, is currently flooded to mid-calf height after the nearby levee was overwhelmed.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Vatten rinner över skyddsvallen i ett 100 fot brett område.
mt: 30 meters of water is flowing over the levee in a 30 meter wide area.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Commons-administratören Adam Cuerden uttryckte sin frustration över det som tagits bort när han talade med Wikinews förra månaden.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over what was removed when he spoke with Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: """Han [Wales] ljög i princip för oss från början. Först genom att agera som om detta var av rättsliga skäl. För det andra genom att låtsas att han lyssnade på oss, ända fram till att hans konst utgår."""
mt: "He [Wales] lied to us in principle from the beginning. First by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Secondly by pretending to listen to us, all the way up to his art."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Irritation inom communityn ledde till de aktuella insatserna för att utarbeta en policy angående sexuellt innehåll för webbplatsen som är värd för miljontals öppet licensierade medier.
mt: Annoyance within the community led to the current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the website that hosts millions of openly licensed media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Det utförda arbetet var mestadels teoretiskt, men programmet skrevs för att simulera observationer som man gjort av Sagittariusgalaxen.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations that have been made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Effekten som forskarlaget letade efter skulle orsakas av krafter som påminner om tidvatten hos galaxens mörka materia och Vintergatans mörka materia.
mt: The effect that the research team was looking for would be caused by forces similar to tides in the galaxy's dark matter and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Precis som månen utövar dragningskraft på jorden, vilket orsakar tidvatten, utövar Vintergatan en kraft på Sagittariusgalaxen.
mt: Just as the moon exerts a gravitational pull on the Earth, causing tides, the Milky Way exerts a pull on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Forskarna lyckades konstatera att den mörka materian påverkar annan mörk materia på samma sätt som vanlig materia gör.
mt: The researchers were able to determine that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way that ordinary matter does.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Denna teori säger att den största delen av mörk materia runt en galax är belägna i en slags halo, och är tillverkade av massvis av små partiklar.
mt: This theory says that the largest part of dark matter around a galaxy is located in a kind of halo, and is made up of vast amounts of small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: TV-sändningar visar vit rök som kommer från anläggningen.
mt: TV broadcasts show white smoke coming from the facility.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: De lokala myndigheterna uppmanar befolkningen i området runt kraftverket att stanna inomhus, stänga av luftkonditioneringen och att inte dricka kranvattnet.
mt: Local authorities are advising people in the area around the power plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioning and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Enligt Japans kärnkraftsmyndighet har radioaktivt cesium och jod identifierats vid kraftverket.
mt: According to Japan's nuclear power agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been identified at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Myndigheterna spekulerar i att detta visar att behållare som innehåller uranbränsle på platsen kan ha brustit och läcker.
mt: Authorities speculate that this may show that containers holding uranium fuel on the site are leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Doktor Tony Moll upptäckte den extremt läkemedelsresistenta formen av tuberkulos (XDR-TB) i den sydafrikanska regionen KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the extremely drug-resistant form of tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: "I en intervju sade han att den nya varianten var ""väldigtt oroande och alarmerande på grund av den mycket höga dödlighetsnivån."""
mt: "In an interview he said the new variant was ""very alarming and alarming because of the very high mortality rate."""
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Vissa patienter kan ha smittats av bakterien på sjukhuset, tror doktor Moll, varav minst två var sjukhuspersonal.
mt: Some patients may have been infected with the bacteria at the hospital, Dr. Moll believes, including at least two hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
